mixed-citation.article-title: Taxonomic revision of the species of Stenothemus from Southwest China (Coleoptera, Cantharidae), with the descriptions of five new species

Body length (both sexes): 5.5‒7.0 mm; width: 1.1‒1.5 mm .
China ( Gansu , Qinghai , Shaanxi , Sichuan , Yunnan , Xizang ). New records for Qinghai , Shaanxi , Yunnan .
The female reproductive system is illustrated and described for the first time.
